name: Were you ever free?
description:
I cant export the project DON'T PLAY THIS IT'S NOT FINISHED AND I CANT EXPORT. (I wrote that with less than five minutes left)

The file on this page is unfinished so please don't waste your time on it.

So... Hey.

I Just learned that you can't put a "?" on a name. That was the problem. I'm not even mad that I couldn't publish it because I learned a lot during this week and everything is an experience.

If you want to play the game anyway you can find it here: https://cisnerosshanti.itch.io/were-you-ever-free-gj

I uploaded just as it was yesterday at 10. I didn't even fix the small mistakes and the music is still broken. Such a shame.

///---Details about the game that nobody cares.---\\\

I had a lot of problems with this project but I'm happy with what I got. Originally I was just the artist teamed up with 3 programmers and a great musician, but 2 of them never answered on our discord. Halfway  through I tried to change our game engine because I wasn't happy with it so the other programmer left. I had to do everything but the music.

I started to learn how to make games 3 weeks before the jam so this is my FIRST GAME EVER.

I'm really happy I did it on time and maybe I won't win anything but I wasn't trying to. If someone else enjoys the game I'll be satisfied.

You can follow our great musician on twitter: https://twitter.com/Shakekonigiri

You can follow me to know my next projects: https://twitter.com/cisneros_shanti

THANKS

I'll see you on the next jam.
